# Appendix 8: Spatial Data Processing for Habitat Pressure Indicators {#appendix-8 .unnumbered}

The habitat pressure indicators are currently undergoing revision, and new information will be available here in 2024 that reflects the updated approach to processing spatial habitat data. For a description of the approach used from 2016 - 2024, see [previous versions of this technical report (Version 11)](https://salmonwatersheds.ca/document/lib_475/).
